name: Bloodhound
description: Bloodhound is the obscure cross of Huckleberry Hound and Guard Dawg (by RedEyed Genetics). This genetic coupling was motivated by the desire to preserve the beautiful foliage and tartness of Huckleberry Hound while co-opting Guard Dawg’s potency. With a decent yield and THC percentage upwards of 24%, this strain smells of tart fruit intermixed with an earthy chocolate fondue flavor.
attributes_title: Happy, Talkative, Relaxed, Uplifted, Focused, Stress, Depression, Headaches, Pain, Fatigue, Dry Eyes
